Title: Nothing to Hide
Plot: Niki opens up to a friend when her son becomes the subject of a crisis. Hiro overcomes his doubts about his heroism. Nathan and his wife come up with a strategy to win the election and Peter provides some unexpected assistance. Claire finds out what happened to her missing video tape. Matt and Audrey continue their investigation of the serial killer Sylar.
GuestStars: Rena Sofer, Mark Anthony Cage, Eliza Coleman, Kate Connor, Jackson Wurth, Justin Evans, Stephen Spinella, Rick Peters, Richard Roundtree
